website_summaries.verdict: You may find a few issues that you have to work through if you choose this bike, but once you do you'll find it suitable for off- and on-road riding with its versatile, contemporary design.
pros: This bike's attractive hybrid design combines the best of both worlds – sturdy frame, grippy tires, and responsive 21 gears
Easy to transport, thanks to the lightweight build
cons: A few durability issues have been reported, including bent or broken spokes, irregular brakes, and leaking tire valves

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BIKE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BIKE! I purchased this bike a week ago, with the FREE assembly they offer! I got it shipped directly to the bike store, and picked it up two days later! It was professionally assembled. I have nothing but good things to say about this bike! I have been riding all kinds of bikes for years. This bike is as good as it gets for the money. Its a hybrid but more of a road bike dominant. However it still handled pretty well off road. When its all said and done this bike gets the job done and its in first place for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Lukcic

customer_reviews.title: Great bike; very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this bike after several weeks of ownership. I have put about 85 miles on the bike so far and am very pleased with the operation of the disc brakes and derailers. Was able to make some adjustments to the front derailer when the chain was slipping off; no more issues. The only "surprise" on this bike was the presta air valves. Wasn't able to use my air compressor to fill the tires but quickly solved the problem with a very inexpensive adapter from my local sporting goods store. Looking forward to enjoying many miles on this bike. Very pleased at this point.
customer_reviews.author: RWSJR

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable ride at a great price($319). Assembly was easy with no adjustments necessary.
customer_reviews.author: hawkfan

customer_reviews.title: Diamondback Bike Insight 2
customer_reviews.text: The bike is great. Smooth riding gears and really like disc brakes, much better than the old pads. Fits nicely , easy to shift with little effort to ride.
customer_reviews.author: wbuildjohn

customer_reviews.title: love this bike
customer_reviews.text: love this bike, it is very lite nice components, nice balance. I do need to have the derailleurs adjusted but that's it
customer_reviews.author: SDH

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall for over priced bikes
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bike for the money. Durable and fast. I even ride it in the winter and this bike has taken a beating and kept on going, I don't off road or anything but I deal with pot holes and ice a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Moves very good. No issues after 3 month use.
customer_reviews.text: Good bike, moves well. Arrived with big hole in front tube (had bought it as "used", may be this is why).
customer_reviews.author: V. V.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - best hybrid bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding bike for the price! Easy to put together and tune yourself. Love this quality piece of commuting power!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Rear brake is fine, front brake has some stutter or brake bounce
customer_reviews.text: Rear brake is fine, front brake has some stutter or brake bounce. Adjustments at the cable and calipers not changing the stutter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike, Excellent quality and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike, Excellent quality and craftsmanship. Had two tiny scratches on the frame but was given a 40$ refund. More than happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrar Bukhari

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shifting and great brakes.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding bike for cruising around an RV park or on moderate trails. Light weight but well built. Smooth shifting and great brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent entry bike for female
customer_reviews.text: I sent it to our local bicycle store to assemble it. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Song

customer_reviews.title: What a great bike. Easy to assemble and easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: What a great bike. Easy to assemble and easy to ride. Love it
customer_reviews.author: William Sun

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: Bike arrived on time and in great condition. I don't know if all of the bikes are shipped this way but the only assembly required mounting the handle bars, installing the seat, mounting the front tire, hooking up the brake cables, and some minor adjustments to fit the bike. Road the bike the next day for about 8 miles and really enjoyed the smooth ride and the disk brakes. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Go to a bike shop for best fit.
customer_reviews.text: If I had to do it again, I would have gone to a local bike shop. I ordered it 2" too big. Too late to return, once assembled. Love the bike brand though!
customer_reviews.author: ChefJeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for me. Assembly was easy for me and has required no adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing wrong everything works fine. bike itself is great and has all feature ...
customer_reviews.text: My purchase is an open box item with half price compared original price. There is nothing wrong everything works fine. bike itself is great and has all feature I need. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: brakes have always been bad, real bad
customer_reviews.text: so far broken pedal gears some times stop working, brakes have always been bad, real bad. needs 1 new tire valve, this bike will not last 1 year. bent handle bar out of the box, putting togeather was tough, very bad bike.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bike will require multiple adjustments to the shifter and brakes to get a smooth ride. Spend a few dollars more and get a professionally assembled bicycle. You will save multiple hour of unnecessary frustration by doing so. Don't be fooled by the good reviews! They are not accurate!
customer_reviews.author: lovesdogs333

product_meta.title: Diamondback Bicycles Insight 2 Complete Hybrid Bike
product_meta.description: Our insight line have long been rider favorites due to their versatility and ease of use. The insight 2 continues this tradition of great performance Hybrids stacked with features. This year's bike still has its light and stable aluminum frame and fork, efficient 700C road wheels, a comfortable flat-bar cockpit for an upright riding stance, and quality Shimano drivetrain components. We don't like to tinker too much with success, but for this year we did make a significant upgrade: disc brakes! the braking duties are now taken care of by powerful Tektro mechanical disc with 160mm rotors. This enhances the insight 2's performance even more, allowing one-finger modulation and more control in wet conditions. For charity riders, commuters, and just tooling around the neighborhood, the insight 2 is a proven performer.
feature_bullets: Aluminum alloy frame is durable and comfortably compliant
Integrated Aero alloy straight blade fork for reliable handling. Spokes 14g Stainless Steel
Shimano 21-speed drivetrain provides gears for any terrain, spokes 14g stainless steel
Tektro Aries mechanical disc with 160mm rotors
DB Equation 700C double wall road wheels
